mapper.select: SELECT ARCV_NO ,ARCV_SBJT ,ARCV_CNTT ,REG_DTT ,UPD_DTT ,REG_ID ,UPD_ID ,VW_CNT ,ATT_FL_PTH ,ATT_FL_NM FROM TB_ARCV WHERE ARCV_NO = #{ARCV_NO}
SELECT ARCV_NO ,ARCV_SBJT ,ARCV_CNTT ,ATT_FL_NM ,REG_DTT FROM TB_ARCV ORDER BY ARCV_NO DESC LIMIT #{startRow},#{endRow}
SELECT count(ARCV_NO) as totalCount FROM TB_ARCV

SELECT ARCV_NO ,ARCV_SBJT ,ARCV_CNTT ,REG_DTT ,ATT_FL_PTH ,ATT_FL_NM ,VW_CNT FROM TB_ARCV WHERE 1=1 AND ARCV_SBJT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ARCV_SBJT},'%') AND ARCV_CNTT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ARCV_CNTT},'%') ORDER BY ARCV_NO DESC LIMIT #{startRow},#{endRow}
SELECT count(ARCV_NO) as totalCount FROM TB_ARCV WHERE 1=1 AND ARCV_SBJT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ARCV_SBJT},'%') AND ARCV_CNTT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{ARCV_CNTT},'%')
